text: Oyster is a small unincorporated community on the Atlantic Coast of the Eastern Shore of the U.S. state of Virginia in Northampton County. It is 3 feet (1 meter) above sea level. ==Climate== The climate in this area is has hot, humid summers and generally mild to cool winters. According to the Köppen Climate Classification system, Oyster has a humid subtropical climate, abbreviated "Cfa" on climate maps.Climate Summary for Oyster, Virginia ==Related pages== *Anheuser–Busch Coastal Research Center ==References== * Category:Unincorporated communities in Northampton County, Virginia Category:Eastern Shore of Virginia
title: Oyster, Virginia
